# Call for Proposals: On-Call Primary Care Physician Services
### Solicitation Number: 21401-26-4116293A

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is inviting proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of on-call primary care physician services for the Ontario Region. The services will be required to provide medical support to CSC Health Services staff outside of regular working hours, as well as during weekends and holidays.

### Summary of Statement of Work

* Provide primary care on-call and telephone consultation services for CSC Health Services staff outside of normal working hours, including weekends and holidays
* Provide medical orders and clinical guidance and expertise to healthcare staff
* Refer inmates to community Emergency Service Departments when clinically appropriate

### Key Dates

* **Tender Closing Date:** Monday, November 14, 2022, at 2:00 p.m. EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 14, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date:** November 13, 2025

### Important Details

* Performance of work will be in compliance with the requirements outlined in the statement of work.
* Suppliers must demonstrate experience in providing on-call primary care physician services for similar-sized correctional institutions.
* Cooperative approach to achieving the services is required, with direct communication with CSC staff and adapting to their needs as necessary.
